|lowest attendance= |average attendance= |prevseason=2012â13 |nextseason=2014â15
}} The '2013â14 Premier League' will be the 22nd season of Premier League, the
English professional league for association football clubs, since its
establishment in 1992. The season will start on Saturday 17 August 2013 with the
season concluding on Sunday May 11, 2014 and the fixtures were announced on 19
June 2013. The television broadcast rights will be given two-to-three weeks
later. This will be the first season of the Premier League to use goal-
line technology, with The Football Association having announced that Hawk-Eye
will be installed over a period of up to six weeks in the stadia of the 17 teams
who avoided relegation and the three teams promoted during the previous
season. This marks the first time in Premier
League history Manchester United (defending champions) will go into the season
without Sir Alex Ferguson as manager.
